text: Dear God!i know this is too much to ask but can tomorrow be a better day with no accidents and no protests Amen #BridgeCollapse
#BridgeCollapse This is horrific and tragic. Thoughts go to those still trapped and the loved ones of those that lost their lives.

Took 3 hours but arrived home safely. Others were not as lucky. Sad day in Jozi. #BridgeCollapse
